pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: tidak valid, tidak ada efek, tidak tersedia
tidak berguna, tidak perlu, tidak penting
menghamburkan uang untuk, menyia-nyiakan uang untuk
tidak masuk akal, tidak masuk akal

lessons.japanese: ジェイソンは無口な人だったので彼が何かを言うたび驚いていた。
lessons.indonesian: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.

lessons.japanese: ジェイソンは無口な人だったので彼が何かを言うたび驚いていた。
lessons.indonesian: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.

lessons.japanese: 英国民は無口な国民だ。
lessons.indonesian: The English are a taciturn people.

lessons.japanese: 無口だからなおさら彼が好きなのだ。
lessons.indonesian: I like him all the more for his reticence.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は恥ずかしがりで無口だ。
lessons.indonesian: She is shy and talks little.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は恥ずかしがりで無口だ。
lessons.indonesian: She's shy and doesn't talk much.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は先天的な無口です。
彼は無口で男らしい少年だ。
lessons.indonesian: He is a silent, manly boy.

lessons.japanese: 彼は無口で、話しかけられなければしゃべりません。
lessons.indonesian: He is reticent and he never speaks unless spoken to.

lessons.japanese: 彼は昔は無口な男でした。
lessons.indonesian: He used to be a quiet man.

lessons.japanese: 彼は生まれつきとても無口です。
lessons.indonesian: He is by nature a very quiet person.

lessons.japanese: 彼は観察が鋭いがとても無口だ。
lessons.indonesian: His observation is sharp, but he says very little.

lessons.japanese: 彼は観察が鋭いがとても無口だ。
lessons.indonesian: His observations are sharp, but he doesn't say much.

lessons.japanese: 大きくて、のろくて、無口でした。
lessons.indonesian: He was big and slow and silent.

lessons.japanese: 英国民は無口な国民だ。
lessons.indonesian: The English are a taciturn people.
